name: Pokemon Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire Double Pack
name_original: Pokemon Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire Double Pack
description:
Pokemon Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire Double Pack is an action game developed by Game Freak. It came out on 21-11-2014. Nintendo published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Pokemon Omega Ruby/Alpha Sapphire Double Pack is available on Nintendo 3DS.
